title: Mystery in Orange County: Behind the Scenes
description: Josh Mankiewicz reflects on one of his most memorable episodes: the case of 36-year-old Iraq War veteran Maribel Ramos who calls 911 to reveal she is scared for her safety. When she later disappears, investigators have to figure out who exactly she was afraid of.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
